justification: The response provides explicit evidence of federated learning ('supports federated learning via Vendor 2 AI Edge'), data privacy ('without transmitting raw data... enhances privacy'), compliance ('complies with GDPR and ISO standards'), and technical interoperability ('Supports RESTful interfaces and edge container orchestration... leveraging ONNX and TensorFlow Lite'). The ability section directly references training across decentralized devices without data exchange, fully addressing the requirement.
